readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.WipedMemory: You're the new farmer, aren't you?#$e#You seem... no. I'm sure we've never met.
content.AbigailInMineFirst: Hey, @. Surprised? ...I finally found the courage to come down here.#$b#I felt scared at first, but I pushed through.#$b#I feel much more confident now. This is actually really fun!$h
content.AbigailInMine0: Hey! I made it pretty far, didn't I?$h
content.AbigailInMine1: Eep!$7#$b#Hahah! You scared me! I didn't expect to see another person down here!$h#$e#Sorry, I'm all sweaty from excitement...
content.AbigailInMine2: Hi @! I made it here without fighting any monsters...
content.AbigailInMine3: Hey! It's a relief to see you down here...$h#$e#Um... don't tell my Dad I'm here, okay?$9
content.AbigailInMine4: Hey! Exploring the mines on a rainy day, huh? Me too!$h
content.Henchman1: Gweee-ah!! Human!#$b#...You want to pass? I'm sorry, this is private property.$s
content.Henchman2: I'm sorry, but I can't let you pass... I'd lose my job.
content.Henchman3: You're offering this to me? Hmm... no thanks.$s
content.Henchman4: Mmmm... that looks fresh, but no thanks... why don't you have it?
content.KrobusDarkTalisman: What's that... you're looking for a dark talisman?#$b#...Hmmm. Now that you mention it, I did have one in my possession not too long ago.#$b#Unfortunately, I dropped it while exploring that tunnel in the far corner.#$b#Things started heating up in there, so I left in a hurry and sealed the entrance.#$b#You seem pretty sturdy, though... So I'll open it back up for you. Just be careful, okay?
content.Divorced_bouquet: This... Are you trying to hurt me even more?$s
content.KrobusDarkTalisman_elsewhere: What's that... you're looking for a dark talisman?#$b#...Hmmm. Now that you mention it, I did have one in my possession not too long ago.#$b#Unfortunately, I dropped it while exploring a tunnel in the sewers.#$b#Things started heating up in there, so I left in a hurry and sealed the entrance.#$b#You seem pretty sturdy, though... So I'll open it back up for you. Just be careful, okay?
content.MovieInvite_Festival: The movie theater isn't open on festival days!
content.MovieInvite_Closed: The movie theater is closed for the night...
content.MovieInvite_AlreadyInvitedSomeone: You've already made plans to see a movie with {0} today!
content.MovieInvite_CantInvite: You cannot invite {0} to the movies.
content.MovieInvite_InvitedBySomeoneElse: Sorry, I've already got plans to see a movie today, but maybe you can join us there?
content.MovieInvite_FarmerAlreadySeen: I don't feel like going to the movies again just yet...
content.MovieInvite_AlreadySeen: Sorry, I've already seen a movie this week...
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Sandy: Ooh.. I'd love to join you.  You go on ahead and I'll meet you there, honey... I have to freshen up!
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Dwarf: A moo-what? Well, I'm sure I'll like it! I'd be happy to go with you.
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Krobus: Oh? I normally hide myself from humans...#$b#But I have an idea... I'll meet you at the theater later.
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Wizard: Hmmph... Very well. I will join you for this... spectacle.
content.MovieInvite_Invited: A movie? Sure. I'll meet you at the theater.
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Rude: A movie? Yeah, whatever, sounds good. See you at the theater...
content.MovieInvite_Invited_Child: A movie? Yay! Let's meet up at the theater!
content.MovieInvite_Reject_Child: I don't think I'm allowed to see this...
content.MovieInvite_Reject: Sorry, I'm not in the mood to see a movie right now...
content.MovieTheater_NoTicket: You cannot enter the theater without a ticket!
content.MovieTheater_CurrentlyShowing: A movie is currently being screened, come back again later.
content.MovieTheater_AlreadySeen: You've already seen a movie this week.
content.MovieTheater_WatchAlonePrompt: Would you like to spend your movie ticket to see a movie by yourself?
content.MovieTheater_WatchWithFriendPrompt: Would you like to spend your movie ticket to see a movie with {0}?
content.MovieTheater_LeavePrompt: Are you sure you want to leave the theater without seeing the movie?
content.MovieTheater_ClosedFestival: The movie theater is closed for the festival.
content.MovieTheater_Concession: Welcome to the concessions stand! Would you like to order a snack for your guest?
content.MovieTheater_ConcessionAlone: Oh, it looks like you're here by yourself. If you come here with a guest, you can order them a snack. Try it out some time!
content.MovieTheater_ConcessionPurchased: You wanted the {0}, right? We'll deliver it to {1}'s seat once the movie starts!
content.MovieTheater_AfterMovieAlone: {0} is thinking silently about the film.
content.MovieTheater_AfterMovie: {0} is engaging in lively discussion about the film.
content.MovieTheater_LikeMovie: {0} seems to be having a good time!
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Abigail: A movie? Sure, sounds fun! I'll meet you at the theater.$h#$e#I hope it's an exciting one.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Penny: A movie ticket? Yes, I'd love to go with you! I'll meet you at the theater, honey.$h
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Haley: Oooh... date night, huh? Let me just freshen up a little and I'll meet you at the theater.$h
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Emily: A movie ticket! You know, I was thinking about the movies all day. You must've read my mind! $h#$e#I'll meet you at the theater.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Leah: Oh, a movie? Sure, sounds fun.... It'll be like we're dating again, hehe.$h#$e#I'll meet you at the theater.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Maru: Oh! You planned a date night for us? $h#$b#I'd love to go! I'll see you at the theater.$h
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Alex: Hey, sounds fun! I've been wanting to see this one... and I'd rather see it with you!#$b#I'll meet you at the theater.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sam: Nice! You got us tickets? You're the best! I'll wait for you at the theater.$h
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sebastian: Oh, you want to go to the movies? Sounds pretty good. I'll meet you there.$h
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Shane: Oh, you want to see a show, huh? Buy me a snack and it's a deal, hehe...$h#$e#I'll meet you there.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Elliott: Yes, my dear, I'd love to see a movie with you! I'll meet you at the theater.
content.MovieInvite_Spouse_Harvey: Movie tickets? Well... yes, I'd love to go with you!$h#$e#It's good to do things like this, I don't want married life to get boring for you!
